title: Compound of Elements with Same EN

content.question: Which of the following claims about a binary compound composed of elements with the same electronegativity is most likely to be true?

choices.label: The compound has properties similar to those of both elements.
The bonding in the compound is nonpolar covalent.
The boiling point of the compound is above <math alttext="1000 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>1000</mtext><mi>Â°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The compound contains strong ionic bonds.

content.answer: The bonding in the compound is nonpolar covalent.
